sources.title: The Adventures of Superman
sources.description: I took the Fleischer/Famous Studios Superman cartoons from the early 40s and edited them together into one continous 2 hour animated movie.

metadata.Plot: Perry White, Lois Lane and Jimmy Olsen get suspicious about Clark Kent's constantly missing work hours and dates. Their deductions regarding the reasons of this may be far away from the truth.
metadata.Actors: Joe Clabby, Casey Donahue, Darian Lopez
